verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذَا ج<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ نَصْرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1184'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14666'>ٱ</tajweed>لْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: Когда Господня помощь ниспадет И с ней победа

verses.text_uthmani: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَرَأَيْتَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14667'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َاسَ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3156'>دْ</tajweed>خُلُونَ فِى دِينِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':2072'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ra'aitan-nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīnillāhi afwājā(n).
verses.translation: И на глазах твоих в религию Аллаха Вольются толпы праведных людей

verses.text_uthmani: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14668'>ٱ</tajweed>سْتَغْفِرْهُ‌ۚ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastagfirh(u), innahū kāna tawwābā(n).
verses.translation: Восславь хвалой Владыку своего И испроси Его прощенья, - Поистине, Он отдающ и всепрощающ
